Posts.Content: Went to Doctor today , he said this type of incision pain will get better over time, it has been 5 weeks since surgery and it has improved some, thanks for all the advice.
Posts.Title: incision pain

Posts.Content: I had my Robotic Prostatectomy on June 2,2014, three weeks out and generaly feel pretty good, except for when I sit upright for 30 minutes or more my vertical incision starts to hurt and I have to get up or lean back , a little worried about returning to work as a truck driver , Has anyone else experienced this, thanks
Posts.Title: incision pain

Posts.Content: Thanks , I have an appointment next tuesday
